channel.title: Testing on Damien Beaufils
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Damien Beaufils

item.title: Developer's Journey podcast #16
item.description: Â« In this episode, I talked to Damien Beaufils, a french software craftsman working in Paris. Damien shared the experience he made on his current project ; how he helped his team focus on quality to improve the whole software. We talked about the different kind of tests, the test pyramid and Damien even shared a very good recipe on how to improve test quality in a legacy or project lacking tests.
